In order to play あそぼうよ！ your device must be connected to the internet. The phone number used to log in must also have access to SMS. Lastly, if you intend to play Type Mode, your device must have a Japanese keyboard installed.

The objective of the game is to play through each song and fill in the blanks as they appear throughout the lyrics. There are two game modes that alter how the game is played. Tap Mode is the easier of the two, simply giving four possible answers to choose from. Type Mode is much more advanced, requiring the user to type in the missing lyrics using a combination of Hiragana, Katakana, and Kanji.
